_data.description: Empower your NuxtJS application with @nuxt/content module: write in a content/ directory and fetch your Markdown, JSON, YAML and CSV files through a MongoDB like API, acting as a Git-based Headless CMS.
_data.title: Getting started

children.value: directory and fetch your Markdown, JSON, YAML and CSV files through a MongoDB like API, acting as a
, supporting Markdown, YAML, CSV and JSON:
Learn how to fetch your content with
Learn how to display your Markdown content with the

_data.text:
Empower your NuxtJS application with `@nuxtjs/content` module: write in a `content/` directory and fetch your Markdown, JSON, YAML and CSV files through a MongoDB like API, acting as a **Git-based Headless CMS**.

## Writing content

Learn how to write your `content/`, supporting Markdown, YAML, CSV and JSON: https://content.nuxtjs.org/writing.

## Fetching content

Learn how to fetch your content with `$content`: https://content.nuxtjs.org/fetching.

## Displaying content

Learn how to display your Markdown content with the `<nuxt-content>` component directly in your template: https://content.nuxtjs.org/displaying.

_data.title: Getting started

A crawler using NestJS, PuppeteerJS, and MongoDB to get backer's
      data, fund progress, raised amount ... because of the need for
      campaigners in the time of Indiegogo closed some of their API.

_data.text:
Indiegogo Campaign crawler
A crawler using NestJS, PuppeteerJS, and MongoDB to get backer's data, fund progress, raised amount ... because of the need for campaigners in the time of Indiegogo closed some of their API.
Working with techstack:
  • - NodeJS - NestJS

children.value:
Mini web app to tracking
      the number of covid-19 cases in Vietnam and the world using
      Government's API data. Besides that, Covid19Nhom9 also gathers
      the latest news about Covid-19's topic from top newspapers in
      Vietnam ( Tuoitre.vn, dantri.vn, VNExpress,... )

_data.text:
[School Project] Covid19Nhom9
Mini web app to tracking the number of covid-19 cases in Vietnam and the world using Government's API data. Besides that, Covid19Nhom9 also gathers the latest news about Covid-19's topic from top newspapers in Vietnam ( Tuoitre.vn, dantri.vn, VNExpress,... )
Working with techstack:
  • - NodeJS - Express with Cheerio.
  • - PugJS Templalte
  • - MySQL.

OA @ J&T Express Vietnam
An office automation system of J&T Express Vietnam
Working with techstack:
  • - PHP - Laravel
  • - Vue - NuxtJS
  • - Mysql
  • - Firebase FCM
